english.segment1: Lord bring me home again. I'm no longer able. To bear the bitter winds. Or the heavy rains. I've long been settled. Lord without comfort. Just a man on an earthly throne headed for the grave
english.segment2: Carry me home. Sweet Jesus lift me. Until I've flown. The shadow of shame. Your love alone. Lord Jesus mends me. Lift me up. Oh Lord carry me home
english.segment3: Lord I've been branded. A loyal sinner. Seems like forever. Since I said Your name. I'm just a pilgrim. Still afraid of dying. But the sea is shining brightly. With Your grace
english.segment4: Carry me home. Sweet Jesus lift me. Until I've flown. The shadow of shame. Your love alone. Lord Jesus mends me. Lift me up. Oh Lord carry me home
english.segment5: Carry me home. Sweet Jesus lift me. Until I've flown. The shadow of shame. Your love alone. Lord Jesus mends me. Lift me up. Oh Lord carry me home
english.segment6: Carry me home. Sweet Jesus lift me. Until I've flown. The shadow of shame. Your love alone. Lord Jesus mends me. Lift me up. Oh Lord carry me home
english.segment7: Lift me up. Oh Lord carry me home
